info.title: fraudapi
info.description: Easily and directly scan and block fraudulent security threats in input.

post.description: Perform fraud detection and classification on input document and user context.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to perform fraud detection on

post.summary: Advanced AI Fraud Detection for Documents
post.description: Perform advanced fraud detection and classification on input document and user context.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: UserEmailAddressVerified
parameters.description: True if the user's email address was verified (optional)

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to perform fraud detection on

AdvancedFraudDetectionResult.description: Result of performing an advanced document fraud analysis

CleanResult.description: True if the document is clean, false if fraud threats were found

FraudRiskLevel.description: Overall fraud risk level between 0.0 and 1.0

ContainsFinancialLiability.description: True if the document contains financial liability

ContainsSensitiveInformationCollection.description: True if the document contains sensitive data collection from the recipient

ContainsAssetTransfer.description: True if the document contains an asset transfer

ContainsPurchaseAgreement.description: True if the document contains a purchase agreement

ContainsEmploymentAgreement.description: True if the document contains an employment agreement

AnalysisRationale.description: Rationale on why the document was classified as such

FraudDetectionResult.description: Result of performing fraud detection on a document

CleanResult.description: True if the document is clean, false if fraud threats were found

FraudRiskLevel.description: Overall fraud risk level between 0.0 and 1.0

ContainsFinancialLiability.description: True if the document contains financial liability

ContainsSensitiveInformationCollection.description: True if the document contains sensitive data collection from the recipient

ContainsAssetTransfer.description: True if the document contains an asset transfer

ContainsPurchaseAgreement.description: True if the document contains a purchase agreement

ContainsEmploymentAgreement.description: True if the document contains an employment agreement
